meanings.definition: A disease affecting birds, especially poultry, caused by a virus.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the fowlpoxes spreading among his chickens.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated several cases of fowlpoxes in the flock.
meanings.sent3: The fowlpoxes seemed to have a party in the coop, infecting all the birds!
meanings.sent4: The fowlpoxes crept through the poultry like a silent intruder in the night.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the fowlpoxes on the birds was a grim reminder of the virus's presence.

meanings.definition: The plural form of fowlpox, referring to multiple cases of the disease.
meanings.sent1: The farm had to deal with various fowlpoxes outbreaks over the years.
meanings.sent2: The fowlpoxes in the region were a cause for concern among farmers.
meanings.sent3: It was like a parade of fowlpoxes marching through the barnyard!
meanings.sent4: The fowlpoxes multiplied like rabbits, affecting more and more birds.
meanings.sent5: The fowlpoxes spread like wildfire, leaving no chicken untouched.
